children.content:
Everyone has a story to tell.
What's yours?

Vintage lens & analog film photography
by Póth Attila

children.class: font-eb-garamond p-[20px] mt-0 md:ml-8 text-1xl md:text-2xl text-black rounded-md md:max-w-[80%] break-inside-avoid
children.content: ❝ I'm a professional photographer, based in Budapest, Hungary. I work mainly with analog film & vintage lenses as I love non-mainstream, imperfect, nostalgic looks: pictorialists, old Hollywood, Technicolor and 1980s movies. Do you want to work with me?

children.class: mt-[128px] font-eb-garamond text-2xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-black p-4 rounded-md max-w-[80%]
children.content:
Photos on the site available as high-quality prints.
Contact me for details.

font-eb-garamond text-black font-bold pt-[88px] md:ml-8 text-2xl md:text-5xl mb-4
children.content: Hello!

children.class: font-eb-garamond mt-[20px] md:mt-0 md:ml-8 text-2xl md:text-2xl text-black rounded-md max-w-[80%]
children.content: I'm a professional photographer, based in Budapest, Hungary. I work mainly with analog film & vintage lenses as I love non-mainstream, imperfect, nostalgic looks: pictorialists, old Hollywood, Technicolor and 1980s movies. I am intrigued by the human condition, seeking the personal narrative with anyone I photograph.

children.class: font-eb-garamond mt-[20px] md:mt-0 md:ml-8 text-2xl md:text-2xl text-black rounded-md max-w-[80%]
children.content: I collaborate with brands, entrepreneurs, artists, designers, model agencies, event organisers and venues, shooting narrative series, environmental portraiture and visual branding.

children.class: m-[20px] mx-auto flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-center font-eb-garamond text-2xl md:text-3xl text-black max-w-[400px]
children.content:
Since 2022, I have been photographing the yearly fashion shows of Forrai Methodic Art School's designers, with also their exam works as lookbooks.

Here are some highlights from the 2024 and 2025 collections.

children.captionStyle: absolute inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center font-eb-garamond text-4xl md:text-6xl
children.caption:
FASHION WERK & BACKSTAGE
Coming soon...

children.class: font-ambroise p-8 absolute inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-4xl md:text-7xl
children.content: Catwalk mood is a distinct genre of fashion photography that captures the atmosphere, energy, and essence of fashion shows and runway events. It goes beyond simply documenting the clothes being presented; it aims to convey the overall vibe and experience of the event.

children.class: font-eb-garamond text-black text-2xl md:text-6xl text-center pt-[120px]
children.content: <b>CONCEPTUAL SERIES</b

children.captionStyle: absolute inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center font-eb-garamond text-4xl md:text-6xl
children.caption:
Narrative documentary
& personal projects

∞

Searching for
genuine connection
in a digital wasteland

HYPNAGOGIA / hyp·na·go·gi·a /
Transitional state of consciousness between wakefulness and sleep

JAMAIS VU /ʒæmei vu:/[french, borrowing meaning 'never seen']
The phenomenon of experiencing often described as the opposite of déjà vu, the observer's impression of experiencing something for the first time, despite rationally knowing that they have experienced it before.

APOPHENIA /ap·o·phe·nia/
The tendency to perceive a connection or meaningful pattern between unrelated or random things

ANEMOIA /ænə'mɔiə/
nostalgia for a time or a place one has never known

children.content: (shot on 80s expired Ilford FP4)

tree.meta:
Inked

I spent a whole day in the tattoo studio Velvet Wolf Ink to capture their day-to-day operations.

Tattoocon

I photographed TattooCon, a convention celebrating tattoo art and culture for years and got published in the Tattoo Magazine.

Pato

Her great-grandfather emigrated from Hungary, so Pato returned to his roots and explored his family's history. Read the full story on my blog.

Pride

I have been participating in the official photo team of the Budapest Pride festival for 5 years now as a volunteer..

Vikings: Flokken

I spent two days with the Flokken crew who keep viking traditions alive.

Mandala

Andi is my friend, a product manager, mother, and a super-talented hand-knitter.

Bendzsi

Bendzsi is my hairdresser and friend, I meet him at their barbershop every month for 8 years now and capture his journey through portraits.

Póth Rebeka

Rebeka is a Budapest-based hungarian illustrator and graphic designer.

children.class: md:w-1/2 w-full p-8 flex flex-col justify-center

children.content: Feature Title — Two Column
A bold deck paragraph that introduces the section. Designed to sit beside the hero image for a magazine-like composition.
Body copy continues here. Use multiple paragraphs to create typographic rhythm and breathing space around the image.

children.class: absolute left-6 top-6 bg-white bg-opacity-80 text-black p-4 max-w-xs

children.content: “A short pull-quote that overlaps the image and adds editorial emphasis.”
Long-form essay title

Start of the essay. Use paragraphs, images, and pull-quotes to create a magazine reading experience. This area is intentionally text-focused to balance the large editorial images above.

Continue the story with careful microcopy and typographic scale for comfortable reading.
